stateDiagram

state ON_GROUP {

        ON1

        ON1 : ON1

        ON1 : enter / #123; light_blue()#59; #125;

        OnHot

        OnHot : OnHot

        OnHot : enter / #123; light_red()#59; #125;

        ON2

        ON2 : ON2

        ON2 : enter / #123; light_yellow()#59; #125;

        ON2 : enter / #123; count = 0#59; #125;

        ON2 : 1. INCREASE / #123; count++#59; #125;

}

%% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
%% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
state "." as ROOT.(InitialState)

Off

Off : Off

Off : enter / #123; console.log( "OFF#92;n")#59; #125;

ON_GROUP --> Off : off

ON1 --> ON2 : INCREASE

ON1 --> Off : DimLight

OnHot --> ON2 : DimLight

ON2 --> ON1 : DimLight

ON2 --> OnHot : 2. INCREASE [count >= 3]

ROOT.(InitialState) --> Off

Off --> ON1 : INCREASE
Events
settings
